author: andschwa
body:
This is very annoying UX.

``` powershell
PS C:\Users\andschwa\src\PowerShell>    exit
  : The term ' ' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program. Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
At line:1 char:1
+    exit
+ ~
    + CategoryInfo          : ObjectNotFound: ( :String) [], ParentContainsErrorRecordException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CommandNotFoundException

PS C:\Users\andschwa\src\PowerShell> exit
```

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I wish I'd recorded what commit and OS I hit this on; as it is, I can't repro it any more. Closing.

title: Space before commands is not stripped
